mapper.sql: id, main_task_num, main_task_type_code, task_status, date_chg, main_task_seq, group_id, sequence, create_date, remark, priority, task_group_code, exector_num, area_code, source_floor, dest_floor, elevator_work_type, static_via_paths,static_pod_code, biz_process
mapper.update:
update ts_main_task set priority = #{priority} where main_task_num in
#{item}
mapper.select: select count(*) from ts_main_task where task_status = '0' or task_status = 0
select count(*) from ts_main_task where task_status = '1' or task_status = 1
select count(*) from ts_main_task where task_status = '9' or task_status = 9
select IFNULL(count(*),0) from ts_main_task where (task_status = '1' or task_status = 1) AND (main_task_type_code='USpTop')
select IFNULL(count(*),0)from ts_main_task where (task_status = '1' or task_status = 1) AND (main_task_type_code='supplyAndRecycle')
select IFNULL(count(*),0) from ts_main_task where (task_status = '1' or task_status = 1) AND (main_task_type_code='emptyRecycleTask')

select COUNT(DISTINCT id) AS dateList, FROM_UNIXTIME(UNIX_TIMESTAMP(create_date)-(UNIX_TIMESTAMP(create_date)%(60*60)),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as hours FROM ts_main_task WHERE task_status = 9 or task_status = '9' GROUP BY FROM_UNIXTIME(UNIX_TIMESTAMP(create_date)-(UNIX_TIMESTAMP(create_date)%(60*60)),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s');

select COUNT(DISTINCT id) AS dateList, FROM_UNIXTIME(UNIX_TIMESTAMP(create_date)-(UNIX_TIMESTAMP(create_date)%(60*60)),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as hours FROM ts_main_task WHERE task_status = 1 or task_status = '1' GROUP BY FROM_UNIXTIME(UNIX_TIMESTAMP(create_date)-(UNIX_TIMESTAMP(create_date)%(60*60)),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s');
